attributes.action: Teenage mums to be on baby adverts
attributes.additional_details:
On baby adverts there is always the stereotypical Middle Aged mother with babies advertising the products. Teenage motherhood is on the rise, and like most others would agree, we are yet to see a teenage parent model advertise these products.
My aim is to get as many signatures as possible to support my message to these companies and one day I hope to see teenage mother models advertising on these baby product adverts!
